Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization

Authorization Endpoint related classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationRequest
    Oauth 2.0.
    AuthenticationRequestProvider
    Provides an authentication Request.
    AuthorizationEndpointConfiguration
    Oauth 2.0.
    AuthorizationEndpointRequestConfiguration
    Encapsulates the parts of the Oauth 2.0.
    AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider
    Provides an authorization redirect URL.
    IdTokenHintProvider
    Resolves a Id Token Hint.
    LoginHintProvider
    Resolves a LoginHint.
    NonceProvider
    Generates a nonce.
    StateProvider
    Generates a state parameter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationRequestAdapter
    Provides an AuthenticationRequest by combining OauthConfiguration, StateProvider, NonceProvider, AuthorizationEndpointConfiguration.
    AuthorizationEndpointConfigurationProperties
    ConfigurationProperties for OAuth 2.0 authorization endpoint.
    AuthorizationRequestResponseTypeCodeCondition
    Condition which ensures the AuthorizationEndpointRequestConfiguration.getResponseType() is code.
    AuthorizationRequestResponseTypeCondition
    Conditions which verifies AuthorizationEndpointRequestConfiguration.getResponseType() is a particular response type.
    DefaultAuthenticationRequestProvider
    Default implementation of AuthenticationRequestProvider.
    DefaultAuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider
    Default implementation of AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Display
    OpenID connect Display parameter.
    Prompt
    OpenID connect prompt parameter.
    ResponseType
    Authentication Flows response types.
